td.content: s:patient presents with moderate gradual weight gain, moderate increased urination. she has history of moderate elevated fasting blood glucose levels. patient is a 70 yr old f retired. o:Height 67 in, Weight 179 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, Skin = hyperpigmentation over axillary creases, appears in NAD, Extremities = no edema, no skin breakdown, 2 + dorsalis pedis pulses, Extremities = DTRs = 1+ throughout, decreased proprioception B/L, Heart = RRR, PMI not displaced, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Eyes = yellowish white discoloration noted on the retina and microaneurysms a:Type 2 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ACTOS - 30 mg daily, and ordered Glucose Tolerance, 3Hr panel.
